pitt.search.semanticvectors

Class IncrementalTermVectors

  • java.lang.Object
    • pitt.search.semanticvectors.IncrementalTermVectors
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    VectorStore

    public class IncrementalTermVectors
extends java.lang.Object
implements VectorStore
    generates term vectors incrementally (i.e. one document at a time)
    Author:
    Trevor Cohen, Dominic Widdows

        Constructor that gets everything it needs from a TermVectorsFromLucene object and writes to a named file.
        Parameters:
        luceneIndexDir - Directory of the Lucene Index used to generate termVectorData
        fieldsToIndex - String[] containing fields indexed when generating termVectorData
        docVectorFileName - Filename containing the input document vectors
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
